# cryptolab

1. Develop a crypto system based on transposition cipher (with double permutation). The key length could be of any size.

2. The output (cipher text) after the encryption process (using substitution cipher) is given below. Find out the original plaintext.

          



3. Find multiplicative inverse using Euler’s theorem.

4. Factorize a number using Pollard p–1 factorization method. Compare the time with the “Trial Division” method.

5. Develop Diffie-Hellman method of exchanging secret key.
